author: joes
msg: Commit more tests (and iron out a few kinks in mod_apreq.c) which mix redirects with prefetch logic.

author: stas
msg: when testing whether Apache started as root and running under 'nobody'
or alike, will be able to -r/-w/-x in t/ use 'su' instead of 'sudo',
the latter is not available on all unix platforms.

author: stas
msg: in the Apache/test.pm nuke code s/PERLRUN/FULLPERL/ as older MakeMaker

author: bnicholes
msg: Check to make sure that there is a file name before sending it to strncmp().  This
fixes a page fault on NetWare when using mod_proxy with mod_cache.
